SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Class CentralServer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.CentralServer
public class CentralServer extends Object
This class is the main server that manages all the commands issued by the clients.

      Returns:

    • connect

      public void connect(String nickname, VirtualClient client) throws IllegalStateException
      Subscribes the player to the server, putting them in a lobby if possible.

      Binds the player to the given nickname, unique identifier, and assigns them to an open lobby or reconnects the player to the game they left either directly or indirectly.

      Parameters:
      nickname - unique identifier of the user
      client - instance of the virtual client
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - may be thrown for different reasons:
      - the client is already connected;
      - the nickname passed is already in use;
      - an inner state exception is raised.

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect(String nickname, VirtualClient client) throws IllegalStateException, IllegalArgumentException
      Unsubscribes the player from the server.

      The bind between the user and their identifier might or might not be released, depending on the stage of the match in which the user left.

      Parameters:
      nickname - unique identifier of the user
      client - instance of the disconnecting client
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - may be thrown for different reasons:
      - a client instance not connected is trying to disconnect
      - an inner state exception
      IllegalArgumentException - may be thrown for different reasons:
      - nickname doesn't match any of the connected players' nicknames
      - an inner state exception

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(String messenger, String addressee, String message) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Forwards the message to the chat handler to be handled.
      Parameters:
      messenger - unique id of the messenger
      addressee - nickname of the addressee
      message - text to be sent
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the messenger or the addressee is not connected to the server.
